name: Leah
description:
The story so far:

Leah and Carter have been at each other from the moment they met. In their latest tussle, Carter has gone and lost all of the gems that contain The Isle of Cats power! Worst part being, they really need to be recharged soon. Can Leah beat Carter and recover the gems? Even with all of his friends helping?

Controls: KeyGamepad (with respect to xbox)EffectLeft/Right or A/DLeft/RightMoveUp or WAJumpSpaceXAttackEscapeStartBring up Menu / Return to title (only from map)
